text: Ernesto Samper Pizano (born 3 August 1950) is a Colombian politician. He served as the 29th President of Colombia from 1994 to 1998, representing the Liberal Party. ==References== ==Other websites== *Biography by Fundación CIDOB (in Spanish) Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Colombia Category:Politicians from Bogotá
title: Ernesto Samper
